ANOTHER DRAW

Yeltz 1 Clevedon 1

25 November 2000

After beating them 4-1 down at their place, hopes were high we'd complete our first double of the season. However, a reasonably disappointing draw kept us right down in the relegation fight in . The Yeltz goal was another from the amazing Ross Collins whose now top scorer fro the season with 5.

More transfer news (although not officially confirmed): it appears Ian Aldridge has been released again, and Craig Mansell has returned to Weymouth after we paid to get him fit. Rumours of replacements include Sam Bowen , Lyndon Rowland (!) and the two chaps mentioned below. More whenever I hear.

We've got two away matches coming up. Next Saturday brings a first ever game against , then the Saturday after takes us to , who have had 6 matches called off already this season.
